BattleCardDesc.Ability: [Good Job~] If the last die on this page loses in a clash, the opponent gains 1 Haste and Endurance next Scene
BattleCardDesc.Behaviour: [On Clash Win] Last die gains +1 Power
[On Clash Win] Last die gains +1 Power
[On Hit] Seal a Speed die of target next Scene

BattleCardDesc.Ability: [Well Done~] If the first die on this page loses in a clash, the opponent gains 1 Strength next Scene
BattleCardDesc.Behaviour: [On Clash Win] Destroy all dice on target's page

BattleCardDesc.Ability: [Nice Work~] If all dice on this page lose in a clash, the opponent restores 2 Light
[When We Meet~] Stagger target; Target is Stupefied next Scene
[ALL OF YOU;][ONCE I BEGIN] Inflict one of the following statuses to targets at random: 2 Fragile, 2 Disarm, 2 Feeble, 2 Protection, 2 Strength, 2 Endurance
If the last die fails to deal damage, inflict self with 2 Feeble next Scene
BattleCardDesc.Behaviour: [On Clash Win] Next die gains +1 Power; inflict 1 Bleed next Scene
[On Clash Win] Next die gains +1 Power; inflict 1 Bleed next Scene
[On Clash Win] Next die gains +1 Power; inflict 1 Bleed next Scene
[On Hit] Gain 1 Haste and Strength next Scene

BattleCardDesc.Ability: [On Use] Recover 8 HP for the ally with the lowest current HP
[On Use] Give 2 Protection to the ally with the lowest current HP
[On Use] Give 1 Strength to the ally with the lowest current HP
